name: crop-image
description: Crop and send image to s3
author: <arnaud.beun@aircall.io>

scripts.deploy: npm run docker:build && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.deploy:dev: docker run --rm -v ~/.aws/:/root/.aws:ro  -e AWS_PROFILE=julia lambda_build:latest serverless deploy
scripts.package:prod: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/target:/opt/app/target lambda_build:latest serverless package --stage prod --package target/prod
scripts.deploy:prod: docker run --rm -v ~/.aws/:/root/.aws:ro  -e AWS_PROFILE=<your-profile>  -v $(pwd)/target:/opt/app/target lambda_build:latest serverless deploy --stage prod --package target/prod
